fields.label: Enter your Alcohol Ingredients Relief registration number
Enter the postcode of your primary place of business
fields.infoText: This is the postcode you gave to HMRC when you registered for VAT Refunds

sections.title: You are completing a Alcohol Ingredients Relief claim for the following registration
Provide your business and contact details
sections.description: Enter the details of someone who we can contact if we need to discuss your claim.

fields.label: How would you like to be contacted?
fields.errorMessage: Select if you would like to be contacted by email or phone

sections.title: Enter the address where the alcoholic ingredients are used
Has the registered business address changed from the last claim?

fields.errorMessage: Select yes or no for a change of business address

fields.label: Building society roll number (if you have one)
fields.helpText: Enter the roll number as shown on your card or on statements from your building society

fields.errorMessage: Select either yes or no to tell us whether your business has stopped trading

sections.title: Enter the date that your business stopped trading
Enter the start and end dates for this claim
sections.description: Your claim must cover a period of at least three calendar months unless you have stopped trading.

sections.title: How would you like to provide final product details?
sections.description:
You will need to provide details of each different final product you are claiming for.
 A final product is an eligible article made or prepared using alcoholic ingredients. For example, rum and raisin ice cream.

fields.infoText: If you have more than 10 different final products youâ€™ll need to upload a document of the details.

fields.errorMessage: You must select to either enter or upload product details

sections.title: Provide the final product details
sections.description: Provide details of each different final product you are claiming for

fields.infoText:
Upload a single file. This must include:  
* a description of each final product 
* quantity in kilograms of each final product
We accept spreadsheets and documents in formats like PDF and JPEG (12MB maximum)

sections.title: Enter the total quantity of all final products
Provide the final product details
sections.description:
Enter details for each different final product you are claiming for.
 Include a brief description. For example, steak and ale pie.

fields.repeatAddAnotherText: Add details for a different final product

sections.title: Tell us which alcoholic ingredients you have used

fields.label: Have you used spirits?
fields.errorMessage: Select yes or no for using spirits

fields.label: Have you used beer?
fields.errorMessage: Select yes or no for using beer

fields.label: Have you used wine or made-wine?
fields.errorMessage: Select yes or no for using wine or made-wine

fields.label: Have you used cider or perry?
fields.errorMessage: Select yes or no for using cider or perry

fields.label: Do you have any over-declarations?
fields.errorMessage: Select yes or no for over-declarations

fields.label: Do you have any under-declarations?
fields.errorMessage: Select yes or no for under-declarations

fields.label: Total amount of relief claimed for all alcoholic ingredients is

sections.title: Tell us which alcoholic ingredients you over-declared for in previous claims

fields.label: Did you over-declare for spirits?
fields.errorMessage: Select yes or no for over-declared spirits

fields.label: Did you over-declare for beer?
fields.errorMessage: Select yes or no for over-declared beer

fields.label: Did you over-declare for wine or made-wine?
fields.errorMessage: Select yes or no for over-declared wine

fields.label: Did you over-declare for cider and perry?
fields.errorMessage: Select yes or no for over-declared cider and perry

sections.title: Over-declarations for wine or made-wine (including fortified wine)

fields.label: Total claimed for current period is
Total over-declaration from previous periods is

sections.title: Tell us which alcoholic ingredients you under-declared for in previous claims

fields.label: Did you under-declare for spirits?
fields.errorMessage: Select either yes or no for under-declared spirits

fields.label: Did you under-declare for beer?
fields.errorMessage: Select either yes or not for under-declared beer

fields.label: Did you under-declare for wine or made-wine?
fields.errorMessage: Select either yes or no for under-declared wine

fields.label: Did you under-declare for cider or perry?
fields.errorMessage: Select either yes or no for under-declared cider or perry

fields.label: Amount of duty under-declared
fields.errorMessage: Enter the amount of duty under-declared

sections.title: Under-declarations for wine and made-wine (including fortified wine)

fields.label: Total claimed for current period is
Total under-declaration from previous periods is
Total claimed for current period is
Total over-declaration from previous periods is
Total under-declaration from previous periods is

sections.title: Provide your claim details
sections.description: Provide a worksheet or spreadsheet to show how youâ€™ve calculated your claim amount.

fields.infoText:
Upload a single file. This must include: 
* all the information listed in Section 5.5 of Excise Notice 41: Alcoholic Ingredients Relief
* further details of any over-claims or under-claims from previous periods that you have included in this claim, broken down by final product
We accept spreadsheets and documents in formats like PDF and JPEG (12MB maximum)

fields.label: Full name
fields.errorMessage: Enter full name

fields.label: Email address
fields.helpText: We will send an email to this address to confirm we have received your claim.

fields.infoText:
By entering your full name above you confirm that:
* the information given on this form and in any accompanying documents is true and complete
* I have read, understood and complied with the conditions in Excise Notice 41: Alcoholic Ingredients Relief
* I have evidence that I have paid the duty for which this claim is made, as per section 3.1 of Excise Notice 41
* an eligible article for which this claim has been made has been produced as per section 4(2) of the Finance Act 1995
* no other claim for Alcoholic Ingredients Relief has been or will be made relating to this duty as per section 4(3)(e) of the Finance Act
This is your last opportunity to print or save a PDF copy of your submitted claim.

We will pay any Alcoholic Ingredients Relief refund due to the bank account you provided in your claim. 

Contact the Excise Helpline on 0300 200 3700 if you need help with your claim or need to make any changes to it.
[What do you think of this service?](https://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/4669732/Feedback-Survey-AIR) (takes 1 minute)
